alpha.title: Tweeten Alpha 10
alpha.description:
Hi everyone,

Today we are releasing Build 10 to testers in the alpha update channel.

The update includes new improvements.

Here's what's new:

  • Lots and lots of bug fixes

beta.title: Tweeten Beta 1.2
beta.description:
Hi everyone,

Today we are releasing Beta 1.2 to testers in the beta update channel.

Here's what's new:

  • Twitter Cards (including Polls) are now supported! Open a tweet in detail to view the Card.
  • New Light theme (Not ready yet, needs lots of improvements)
  • Fixed the Welcome screen. (This time for real)
  • You can now close a picture by clicking elsewhere inside the lightbox.
  • You can now click on a picture opened in the image preview to view it's full resolution equivalent (will open it in the browser).
  • Fixed an issue which disabled users from adding multiple accounts.
  • We improved UI for the app's dialogs a little bit.
